<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>deployAltIsAgl</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Deploy Altitude is AGL</myLabel> <myToolTip>When checked, the deploy altitude is AGL.
